local_intent: Verify the ApproachAndAlign on the bread by perceiving it, attempting alignment (with limited retry), then confirming the end-effector is at the bread target.
assumptions: Gripper is open from previous step
coherence_with_global: Uses DetectObject to confirm target, performs ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.005 and timeout 1500 as in GLOBAL_BT, retries once if alignment fails per recovery policy, then verifies proximity via IsAt before proceeding to LowerUntilContact in the global sequence.
